feature1.title: AI Interview Practice
feature1.description: Experience realistic interview scenarios with our advanced AI interviewer that adapts to your responses.

feature2.title: Job Description Analysis
feature2.description: Upload job descriptions to receive tailored interview questions and preparation guidance specific to the role.

feature3.title: Resume Integration
feature3.description: Upload your resume to get personalized questions based on your experience and background.

feature4.title: Customizable Settings
feature4.description: Configure interviewer personality, difficulty level, and interview style to match your needs.

feature5.title: Detailed Feedback
feature5.description: Receive comprehensive feedback on your answers, communication style, and areas for improvement.

feature6.title: Progress Tracking
feature6.description: Monitor your improvement over time with detailed performance analytics and progress reports.

feature7.title: Industry-Specific Questions
feature7.description: Access a vast database of interview questions tailored to your industry and role level.

feature8.title: Data Security
feature8.description: Practice with confidence knowing your personal information and interview responses are fully protected.
